name: Vigilance Wing
flavor_text: "The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance

frame.name: Harsh Truths
frame.description: This weapon fires a 5-round burst. When a nearby ally is killed, gain health regeneration and increased movement speed.

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description: Improved weapon performance and greatly increased recovery when its wielder is the last living member of a fireteam.
perks.name: Last Stand

perks.description:
This weapon has a versatile dual-purpose stock.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Composite Stock
